nodes.text: Pipe-weasels were a type of creature. After the human boy Jak saved Lazula, one of the crime lord Talvee Chawin's associates, Jak visited the crime lord and asked for a reward. Chawin claimed that the fact that he had not gutted Jak like a pipe-weasel was his reward, but then provided the electromagnetic pulse device Jak wanted after the boy agreed to work for him.
Pipe-weasels were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
